tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: dr.ramu is an excellent problem finder and quite practical. he knows what he is talking abt well experienced. he gives nice treatment for covid 19 patients. all the four elders of my family including me got recovered from covid 19 in May 21. for me it's 2nd time and iam still fine. we all recommend dr.ramu for his grace and ease in treating his patients.      bharathi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was working on weight loss and lost a lot of energy which put me in a bad state. The doctor was so kind and friendly to explain about a healthy way of dieting and wait loss. He treated me with care and I hope to be back doing well very soon. Thank you so much doctor Ramu..

tags: None
review: Doctor is really very kind. Would definitely recommend others to choose Dr. Ramu for Orthopaedic treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor has no patience to listen to the problem. We went to treat a cut injury on the wrist, he did not even look at the injury and decided it would require stitches be applied. He did not discuss anything or gave us any options to think.

Post applying stitches, they prescribed some ******* medicine ** ***** **** **** *** *** **** *** **** ******** *** **** *** ******** *******. 
He did not advise anything on the food or precautions to be taken, he is always in a hurry ** ** **** ** *** ***** ** ** *** **** ******** ** *** *********

When we went to get the stitches removed, he was again in rush to leave out somewhere. ** *** * **** *** ********* **** *** ******* **** ** **** ***** ***** ** **** **** **** ** *** *** ** ******. He just laughed and left, without telling anything further. *** *** ****** ****** **** ***** **** ******** ** ****  

We regret the decision of going to this hospital

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * ***** ********** *** *** ****** ** **** ** ******* first of all I have to wait to see the doctor on visiting day. after consultation he asked to do some test, I did from his attached lab that to very expensive and after results came I shared via what's app but he least bothered to tell what are the conclusion and what further remedies to taken to mitigate the same. I tried several time to him but no response , I will not recommend this doctor to anybody and suggest other people also to stay away from him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is a very friendly doctor. he always available over phone for any health suggestions. it is very rare to find such a friendly, helpful and Knowledged doctor.I find consultation fee also affordable, compared to other corporate hospitals. one issue, I want to bring to the doctor sir's notice is, Lucid diagnostics is charging less for CT scan(4200rs) when someone goes without referral, but 5500rs when goes with referral. I want Ramu sir to address this issue and talk to Lucid diagnostics on this.
reply_text: Okay I will find frm lucid diagnostic.

tags: None
review: I got to know about Dr. Ramu P. from one of my friends. I've taken three of my relatives to Dr. Ramu who have been diagnosed positive for covid 19.  Doctor has treated all of them and helped them recover from covid. Throughout the treatment, doctor was very much helpful.  Most importantly, I have to mention about the followup and availability of doctor.  He calls the patients and checks about their well-being. In case you are due a consultation, he will call you to follow up continuously.  You can call the doctor any time throughout the day and he will answer your questions or concerns. He gives all the medicines from his end. Finally, the treatment he does is worth the money he takes.  Overall, a very good doctor for covid treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
